meanings.definition: The state or quality of lacking a clear reason or goal.
meanings.sent1: The purposelessnesses of the project left everyone feeling lost.
meanings.sent2: She felt overwhelmed by the purposelessnesses of her daily routine.
meanings.sent3: The purposelessnesses of the situation made them all laugh at the absurdity.
meanings.sent4: The purposelessnesses of the endless maze symbolized the futility of their efforts.
meanings.sent5: The purposelessnesses of the empty room echoed in her mind long after she left.

meanings.definition: The absence of purpose or meaning.
meanings.sent1: In the vast desert, he felt the weight of purposelessnesses pressing down on him.
meanings.sent2: The purposelessnesses of his existence haunted him in the quiet moments of the night.
meanings.sent3: They joked about the purposelessnesses of their meandering conversation.
meanings.sent4: The purposelessnesses of the abandoned building whispered tales of forgotten dreams.
meanings.sent5: The purposelessnesses of the blank canvas challenged her to find inspiration.
